overview_of_class: 363 focuses upon a variety of theories and research projects that explain and predict behavior within negotiation contexts. These theories will be drawn from a variety of disciplines including organizational behavior, industrial relations, political science, social psychology, and communication.
name: Bargaining and Negotiation
title: SoC COMM_ST 363-0-20 Bargaining and Negotiation
